name: cho1ce.exe
description:
Hi Tom! 

WE NEED TO CHAT! NOW! You know what happend. I can't stop thinking about it. I don't know if it was right. Party will be after us! I need to talk to you. Okay, I have this messenger program. It looks old and bad, but it's fast, simple to use and install. Under this message I wrote how to install it. Install it now, and we'll talk! 

Your friend, William.
